abstract.p: Singer Jimmy Buffett is set to perform in concert at Blockbuster Sony Entertainment Center in Camden, NJ (S)

block.p: It's party time in Camden. Parrotheads by the thousands will be on hand at the Blockbuster Sony Entertainment Center on Thursday to sing and sway with their idol, Jimmy Buffett. Yes, it will seem like a Key West beach. Yes, margaritas will be the drink du jour. Yes, everyone will know the lyrics to ''Why Don't We Get Drunk.''

It's party time in Camden. Parrotheads by the thousands will be on hand at the Blockbuster Sony Entertainment Center on Thursday to sing and sway with their idol, Jimmy Buffett. Yes, it will seem like a Key West beach. Yes, margaritas will be the drink du jour. Yes, everyone will know the lyrics to ''Why Don't We Get Drunk.''

Mr. Buffett's songs might have a lazy Caribbean lilt, but they are fun and have enough grooves to make a coconut proud. Yes, there will be dancing in the aisles. And yes, tickets are $50-26, so hold off on buying that new Hawaiian shirt for the occasion.
